SELECT /* TRMA0070.SEARCH00 제예금명세서 */ SEQ , X.ACCT_UNIT /* 회계단위 */ , X.ACCT_GUBN /* 회계구분_사업장 */ , X.ACCT_INTL /* 계정코드 */ , X.ACCT_NAME /* 계정명 */ , X.COND_CODE /* 관리항목코드 */ , Y.BANK_CODE /* 은행코드 */ , Z.COMD_CDNM AS BANK_NAME /* 은행명 */ , X.COND_VACD /* 관리항목값 */ , X.COND_VANM /* 관리항목값명 */ , X.ACCT_DATE /* 회계일자 */ , DECODE(SEQ, 2, SUBSTR(X.ACCT_DATE, 1, 7), NULL) AS ACCT_MNTH /* 승인월 */ , X.SLIP_NUMB /* 전표번호 */ , X.SLIP_LINE /* 전표라인 */ , X.DISP_NUMB /* 전표번호 */ , X.REMK_NAME /* 적요 */ , X.SLIP_CHAX /* 차변금액 */ , X.SLIP_DAEX /* 대변금액 */ , SUM(X.BALA_AMNT) OVER (PARTITION BY X.ACCT_UNIT, X.ACCT_GUBN, X.ACCT_INTL, X.COND_CODE, X.COND_VACD ORDER BY X.ACCT_UNIT, X.ACCT_GUBN, X.ACCT_INTL, X.SEQ, X.COND_CODE, X.COND_VACD, X.ACCT_DATE, X.SLIP_NUMB, X.SLIP_LINE) AS BALA_AMNT /* 잔액 */ , X.CURR_GUBN /* 통화구분 */ , X.EXCH_RATE /* 환율 */ , X.FORI_AMNT /* 외화금액 */ , 1 AS GRUP_CNTT FROM ( /* 이월잔액집계 */ SELECT 1 AS SEQ , A.ACCT_UNIT , A.ACCT_GUBN , A.ACCT_INTL , C.ACCT_NAME , A.COND_CODE , A.COND_VACD , MAX(NVL(A.COND_VANM, A.COND_VACD)) AS COND_VANM /* 관리항목명 */ , TO_CHAR('전월이월') AS ACCT_DATE , NULL AS SLIP_NUMB , NULL AS SLIP_LINE , NULL AS DISP_NUMB , TO_NCHAR('') AS REMK_NAME , SUM(CASE WHEN C.DRCR_GUBN = 'D' THEN NVL(A.SLIP_CHAX,0) - NVL(A.SLIP_DAEX,0) ELSE 0 END) AS SLIP_CHAX /* 차변 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN C.DRCR_GUBN = 'C' THEN NVL(A.SLIP_DAEX,0) - NVL(A.SLIP_CHAX,0) ELSE 0 END) AS SLIP_DAEX /* 대변 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN C.DRCR_GUBN = 'D' THEN NVL(A.SLIP_CHAX,0) - NVL(A.SLIP_DAEX,0) ELSE NVL(A.SLIP_DAEX,0) - NVL(A.SLIP_CHAX,0) END) AS BALA_AMNT /* 잔액 */ , NULL AS CURR_GUBN , NULL AS EXCH_RATE , NULL AS FORI_AMNT FROM TA_MAMNTD A LEFT JOIN TA_ACCTXM C ON C.ACCT_INTL = A.ACCT_INTL WHERE A.ACCT_UNIT = #ACCT_UNIT# AND A.ACCT_DATE >= SUBSTR(#ACCT_DAT1#,1,4) || '0000' AND A.ACCT_DATE < #ACCT_DAT1# AND A.ACCT_INTL = #ACCT_INTL# /* 계정과목1 */ AND A.COND_CODE = '0064' /* 계좌번호 관리항목 */
A.COND_VACD = #ACNT_NUMB# /*계좌번호 */
GROUP BY A.ACCT_UNIT , A.ACCT_GUBN , A.ACCT_INTL , C.ACCT_NAME , A.COND_CODE , A.COND_VACD UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS SEQ , B.ACCT_UNIT , B.ACCT_GUBN , B.ACCT_INTL , E.ACCT_NAME , C.COND_CODE , C.COND_VACD , NVL(C.COND_VANM, C.COND_VACD) AS COND_VANM /* 관리항목명 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.ACCT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACCT_DATE , B.SLIP_NUMB , B.SLIP_LINE , B.SLIP_NUMB || B.SLIP_LINE AS DISP_NUMB , B.REMK_NAME , CASE WHEN B.DRCR_GUBN = 'D' THEN B.SLIP_AMNT ELSE 0 END AS SLIP_CHAX /* 차변 */ , CASE WHEN B.DRCR_GUBN = 'C' THEN B.SLIP_AMNT ELSE 0 END AS SLIP_DAEX /* 대변 */ , CASE WHEN B.DRCR_GUBN = E.DRCR_GUBN THEN B.SLIP_AMNT ELSE B.SLIP_AMNT * -1 END AS BALA_AMNT , B.CURR_GUBN , B.EXCH_RATE , B.FORI_AMNT FROM TA_SLIPNT B INNER JOIN TA_SLIPRF C ON B.SLIP_NUMB = C.SLIP_NUMB AND B.SLIP_LINE = C.SLIP_LINE AND C.COND_CODE = '0064' /* 계좌번호 관리항목 */ INNER JOIN TA_ACCTXM E ON B.ACCT_INTL = E.ACCT_INTL WHERE B.ACCT_UNIT = #ACCT_UNIT# AND B.ACCT_DATE BETWEEN #ACCT_DAT1# AND #ACCT_DAT2# AND B.ACCT_INTL = #ACCT_INTL# /* 계정과목1 */
C.COND_VACD = #ACNT_NUMB# /*계좌번호 */
) X LEFT JOIN TA_ACNTXM Y ON X.COND_VACD = Y.ACNT_NUMB /* 계좌번호 */ LEFT JOIN TM_CODEXD Z ON Z.COMM_CODE = 'BANK_CODE' AND Y.BANK_CODE = Z.COMD_CODE ORDER BY ACCT_INTL , BANK_CODE , COND_VACD , CONVERT (ACCT_DATE, 'ISO2022-KR') , DISP_NUMB , SLIP_LINE
